body.subject: Requirements ready for architecture review - Epic 28 God Agent Alfred
body.summary: Requirements.json prepared for Epic 28. Focus: unified God Agent consolidating Days 1-27 capabilities into single Telegram entrypoint with intent routing, task planning, skill graph, memory fabric, and consensus bridge.
key_points: Clean Architecture boundaries must be maintained (domain → application → infrastructure → presentation)
Domain layer needs contracts: Intent, TaskPlan, TaskStep, Skill, SkillResult, MemorySnapshot, SafetyViolation
Application layer: IntentRouterService, PlanCompilerService, GodAgentOrchestrator with pause/resume/cancel
Infrastructure adapters: persona/memory repos (Day 25 Mongo), RAG client, MCP/reviewer tools, voice pipeline, Telegram bot
Consensus bridge integration required for multi-agent validation when plan steps flagged as critical
Observability: Prometheus metrics (god_agent_*), structured logs with task_id, skill_id, plan_step
Reuse existing subsystems: Butler (Day 25), RAG (Days 20-22), Builder (Day 13), Reviewer (Day 14/17), Ops (Days 23-24)
concerns: Layer violations: ensure skills call existing use cases, not bypass application layer
Memory fabric must aggregate Day 25 persona + conversation summary + RAG hits + artifacts without violating domain isolation
Consensus bridge must respect docs/roles/consensus_architecture.json schema and not create new patterns
body.action_needed: Review requirements.json and emit architecture.json validating layer boundaries, component contracts, and integration points. Check for security risks and missing SLOs.
